channel.title: Please help!
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]I need help creating admins/mods/owner i went to caractors choose my account and put by player rights 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner but i think i need to use compile.bat but i dont know how to use it.. PLease help ( if i successfuly make admins/mods first one to help gets admin position)
PLease help!!!![/glow] [glow=red,2,300] PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!!!!![/glow]
IF YOU READ THIS PLEASE REPLY!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Please help!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Log out the account.
Go into the charachters folder.
Find the account you want
Change the rights to 2 if you want admin, 1 for mod. Its currently at 0.
Save the file.
Log into the account.
Done.
Note:[i]You must have the account logged out.

Read full topic
